svg.text: Complex Operations, Memory Management & Real-world Applications

g.text: Step 2: Create new node with value 15
• Slow pointer moves 1 step, Fast pointer moves 2 steps
• When fast reaches end, slow is at middle
1. Use two pointers: slow (1 step) and fast (2 steps)
2. If there's a cycle, fast will eventually meet slow
3. If fast reaches NULL, no cycle exists
• Must manually free memory to prevent leaks
Linked Lists vs Arrays - Complete Comparison
